devdoc.details: Allows instant yield generation via adminAddYield for demo purposes

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

adminAddYield(uint256).details: Mints new tokens to simulate yield generation

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.onBehalfOf: Address to credit the supply to

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.to: Address to send the assets to

devdoc.title: MockAavePool

adminAddYield(uint256).notice: Admin function to add yield instantly (for demo purposes)

getAvailableYield().notice: Get available yield (total yield minus principal)

getTotalAssets().notice: Get total assets in pool (principal + yield)

harvestYield(address).notice: Harvest yield (withdraw only the yield, keep principal)

supply(uint256,address).notice: Supply assets to the pool (simulates Aave supply)

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraw assets from the pool (simulates Aave withdraw)

userdoc.notice: Mock Aave Pool for hackathon demo - simulates Aave V3 supply/withdraw functionality
